description: For light footed Rogues who prefer flight to fighting fair!
name: Acrobatics

talents.info_text:
Use an adjacent friend or foe as a springboard, vaulting over them to another tile within range.

This maneuver grants you a burst of speed from your momentum, allowing you run 57%, 67%, 75%, 83%, 91% faster (movement speed bonus) in the same direction you vaulted for 3 turns.

The increased speed ends if you change directions or stop moving.
talents.name: Vault

talents.info_text:
Move to a spot within range, bounding around, over, or through any enemies in the way.

This maneuver can surprise your foes and improves your tactical position, improving your physical critical chance by 1%, 3%, 4%, 5%, 6% for 1 turn.
talents.name: Tumble

talents.info_text:
While this talent is sustained, you anticipate deadly attacks against you.

Any time you would lose more than 41%, 35%, 31%, 28%, 26% of your life in a single hit, you instead duck out of the way and assume a defensive posture.

This reduces the triggering damage and all further damage in the same turn by 8%, 14%, 19%, 23%, 26%.

You need 31.2 Stamina and an adjacent open tile to perform this feat (though it does not cause you to move).
talents.name: Trained Reactions

talents.info_text:
You gain greater facility with your acrobatic moves, lowering the cooldowns of Vault, Tumble, and Trained Reactions by 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, and their stamina costs by 2.3, 4.7, 6.5, 7.9, 8.9.

At Rank 3 you also gain 10% global speed for 1 turn after Trained Reactions activates. At rank 5 this speed bonus improves to 20% and lasts for 2 turns.
talents.name: Superb Agility

description: Ability to shoot.
name: archery - base

talents.info_text: Shoot your bow, sling or other missile launcher!
talents.name: Shoot

description: Specialized bow techniques.
name: archery - bows

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 8, 16, 24, 32, 40 and increases weapon damage by 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% when using bows.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2.
talents.name: Bow Mastery

talents.info_text: You fire an arrow that cuts right through anything, piercing multiple targets if possible with nigh infinite armor penetration, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage.
talents.name: Piercing Arrow

talents.info_text:
You fire two arrows at your target, hitting it and a nearby foe if possible, doing 148%, 159%, 168%, 175%, 182% damage

This talent does not use any stamina.
talents.name: Dual Arrows

talents.info_text: You fire multiple arrows at an area of 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 radius, doing 88%, 99%, 108%, 116%, 122% damage with each arrow.
talents.name: Volley of Arrows

description: Specialized sling techniques.
name: archery - slings

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 8, 16, 24, 32, 40 and increases weapon damage by 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% when using slings.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2.
talents.name: Sling Mastery

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot into your target's eyes, blinding it for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns and doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage.

The blind chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Eye Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a mighty shot at your target, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage and knocking it back.

The knockback chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Inertial Shot

talents.info_text: You fire an average of 2.8, 3.2, 3.6, 3.9, 4.1 shots at your target, doing 46%, 52%, 57%, 62%, 65% damage with each shot.
talents.name: Multishot

description: Specialized archery techniques that result from honed training.
name: archery excellence

talents.info_text:
Your reflexes are lightning-fast, if you spot a projectile (arrow, shot, spell, …) you can instantly shoot at it without taking a turn to take it down.

You can shoot down up to 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 projectiles.
talents.name: Shoot Down

talents.info_text:
You rush toward your foe, readying your shot. If you reach the enemy, you release the shot, imbuing it with great power.

The shot does 202%, 223%, 240%, 254%, 266% weapon damage and knocks back your target by 3, 5, 6, 6, 7.
talents.name: Bull Shot

talents.info_text:
Activating this talent enhances your reflexes to incredible levels. Each time you are attacked in melee, you have a -5%, 20%, 29%, 34%, 37% chance get a defensive shot off in time to intercept the attack, fully disrupting it (including extra blows from certain talents), dealing 60%, 68%, 74%, 80%, 84% archery damage, and knocking the attacker back 0, 1, 1, 2, 2 tiles.

Activating this talent will not interrupt reloading.
talents.name: Intuitive Shots

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot at your target's throat, mouth, or equivalent body part, doing 122%, 135%, 145%, 154%, 161% damage and silencing it for 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 turns.

The silence chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Strangling Shot

description: Specialized archery techniques to maim your targets.
name: archery prowess

talents.info_text:
You fire a burning shot, doing 78%, 89%, 98%, 106%, 112% fire damage to the target and lighting up the area around the target in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

At level 3, it also has a chance to blind for 3 turns.
talents.name: Flare

talents.info_text:
You fire a crippling shot, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage and reducing your target's speed by 12%, 24%, 36%, 40%, 40% for 7 turns.

The status power and status hit chance improve with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Crippling Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a pinning shot, doing 115%, 122%, 127%, 131%, 135% damage and pinning your target to the ground for 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns.

The pinning chance increases with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Pinning Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire multiple shots in a circular pattern with radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, doing 90%, 106%, 119%, 130%, 139% damage and stunning everyone hit for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Scatter Shot

description: Generic archery techniques.
name: archery training

talents.info_text: A steady shot, doing 154%, 172%, 186%, 198%, 208% damage.
talents.name: Steady Shot

talents.info_text:
You enter a calm, focused stance, increasing your Physical Power (+24, +32, +38, +44, +48), Accuracy (+24, +32, +38, +44, +48), Armour penetration (+23, +31, +37, +43, +47), and critical chance (+27%, +35%, +41%, +47%, +51%), but reducing your firing speed by 3%, 9%, 14%, 18%, 21%.

The effects will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Aim

talents.info_text: You switch to a fluid and fast battle stance, increasing your firing speed by 7%, 17%, 25%, 33%, 41% at the cost of your Accuracy (-9, -12, -14, -16, -17), Physical Power (-9, -12, -14, -16, -17), and critical chance (-9%, -12%, -14%, -16%, -18%).
talents.name: Rapid Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot without putting much strength into it, doing 74%, 83%, 91%, 98%, 103% damage.

That brief moment of relief allows you to regain 18, 24, 31, 37, 44 stamina.
talents.name: Relaxed Shot

description: Advanced combat tactics.
name: battle tactics

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on your blows; each strike has a 41%, 48%, 53%, 56%, 58% chance to deal another, similar, blow for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

This works for all blows, even ones from other talents and from shield bashes.

The chance increases with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Greater Weapon Focus

talents.info_text:
After killing a foe, you have a 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100% chance to gain a 1000% movement speed bonus for 1 game turn.

The bonus disappears as soon as any action other than moving is done.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.
talents.name: Step Up

talents.info_text:
Lashes at the target, doing 128%, 139%, 148%, 156%, 162% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, the target will bleed for 248%, 267%, 283%, 296%, 307% weapon damage over 7 turns, and all healing will be reduced by 14%, 24%, 32%, 39%, 44%.
talents.name: Bleeding Edge

talents.info_text:
Take a defensive stance to resist the onslaught of your foes.

While wounded, you gain all damage resistance equal to 23%, 29%, 33%, 37%, 41% of your missing health.

(So if you have lost 70% of your life, you gain 16%, 20%, 23%, 26%, 28% all resistance.)

In addition, your all damage resistance cap increases 12%, 23%, 32%, 39%, 44% closer to 100%.

This consumes stamina rapidly (-15, -11, -9, -8, -7 stamina/turn).

The effects are refreshed at the start of each turn.
talents.name: True Grit

description: Fear nothing!
name: berserker's strength

talents.info_text: Shout your warcry in a frontal cone of radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 7. Any targets caught inside will be confused for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Warshout

talents.info_text:
You enter an aggressive battle rage, increasing Accuracy by 19, 24, 29, 33, 36 and Physical Power by 19, 24, 29, 33, 36 and making you nearly unstoppable, granting 14%, 24%, 32%, 39%, 44% stun and pinning resistance.

Sustaining this rage takes its toll on your body, decreasing your life by 2% each turn, but for every 1% of life missing you gain 0.5% critical hit chance.

Even when sustained, this talent is only active when foes are in sight.

The Accuracy bonus increases with your Dexterity, and the Physical Power bonus with your Strength.
talents.name: Berserker Rage

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 108%, 119%, 128%, 136%, 142% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 3, 8, 12, 16, 20 for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is -19%, 48%, 67%, 76%, 81% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Shattering Blow

talents.info_text:
Search your inner strength for a surge of power.

For 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns you gain 4, 9, 16, 20, 25 stamina per turn and 8%, 14%, 18%, 22%, 26% movement and attack speed.

Only usable at 30% or lower stamina.

Stamina regeneration is based on your Constitution stat.
talents.name: Relentless Fury

description: Delight in the act of battle and the spilling of blood.
name: bloodthirst

talents.info_text:
Your mighty blows inspire utter terror on your foes. Any melee strike you do that deals more than 47%, 39%, 33%, 30%, 27% of the target's total life puts them in a mortal terror, dazing them for 5 turns.

Your critical strike chance also increase by 2%, 5%, 8%, 11%, 14%.

The daze chance increase with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Mortal Terror

talents.info_text:
Delight in spilling the blood of your foes. After scoring a critical hit, your maximum hit points will be increased by 1%, 3%, 5%, 6%, 8%, your life regeneration by 1.42, 2.41, 3.17, 3.81, 4.37 per turn, and your stamina regeneration by 0.28, 0.48, 0.63, 0.76, 0.87 per turn for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The life and stamina regeneration will stack up to five times, for a maximum of 7.09, 12, 16, 19, 22 and 1.42, 2.41, 3.17, 3.81, 4.37 each turn, respectively.
talents.name: Bloodbath

talents.info_text:
You delight in the inflicting of wounds, providing 16, 21, 25, 28, 31 physical power.

In addition when you make a creature bleed its physical damage resistance is reduced by 7%, 16%, 23%, 29%, 34% (but never below 0%).

Physical power depends on your Strength stat.
talents.name: Bloody Butcher

talents.info_text:
You enter a battle frenzy for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns. During that time, you can not use items, healing has no effect, and your health cannot drop below 1.

At the end of the frenzy, you regain 2%, 6%, 9%, 12%, 14% of your health per foe slain during the frenzy.

While Unstoppable is active, Berserker Rage critical bonus is disabled as you lose the thrill of the risk of death.
talents.name: Unstoppable

description: Mastery over their shields separates Skirmishers from Archers, and gives them an edge.
name: Buckler Training

talents.info_text:
Allows shields to be equipped, using Cunning instead of strength as a requirement.

When you are attacked in melee, you have a 17%, 19%, 21%, 22%, 23% chance to deflect the attack with your shield, completely evading it.

The chance to deflect increases with your Cunning.
talents.name: Buckler Expertise

talents.info_text: Bash an enemy in melee range with your shield (twice for talent level 5 or more), doing 140%, 156%, 169%, 180%, 189% damage and knocking them back 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 squares. You may then follow with a deadly short-range sling attack, dealing 210%, 234%, 253%, 270%, 284% damage. The shield bash will use Dexterity instead of Strength for the shield's bonus damage.
talents.name: Bash and Smash

talents.info_text: When you are hit by a projectile, physical or otherwise, you have a 5%, 13%, 20%, 26%, 31% chance to deflect it up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 squares away. At talent level 5, your Bash and Smash shield hit is a guaranteed critical.
talents.name: Buckler Mastery

talents.info_text: Any time you block an attack with Buckler Expertise or Buckler Mastery you instantly counterattack with your sling for 16%, 28%, 37%, 45%, 52% damage This can only occur up to 0, 1, 2, 2, 3 time(s) per turn.
talents.name: Counter Shot

description: Generic combat oriented techniques.
name: combat techniques

talents.info_text:
Rush toward a target spot with incredible speed.

If the spot is reached and occupied, you will perform a free melee attack against the target there.

This attack does 120% weapon damage and can daze the target for 3 turns if it hits.

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
talents.name: Rush

talents.info_text:
You focus your strikes, reducing your attack speed by 10% and increasing your Accuracy by 17, 22, 26, 30, 33 and critical chance by 6%, 11%, 15%, 18%, 20%.

The effects will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Precise Strikes

talents.info_text: You have learned to focus your blows to hit your target, granting +36, +50, +63, +75, +86 accuracy and allowing you to attack creatures you cannot see without penalty for the next 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 turns.
talents.name: Perfect Strike

talents.info_text: Through rigorous training, you have learned to focus your actions for a short while, increasing your speed by 11%, 19%, 26%, 32%, 38% for 5 turns.
talents.name: Blinding Speed

description: Teaches to use various armours, weapons and improves health.
name: combat training

talents.info_text: Your skin becomes more resilient to damage. Increases resistance to all damage by 4.0%, 7.2%, 10%, 13%, 15%.
talents.name: Thick Skin

talents.info_text:
You become better at using your armour to deflect blows and protect your vital areas. Increases Armour value by 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, Armour hardiness by 10%, 22%, 31%, 38%, 44%, and reduces chance to be critically hit by 2%, 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, assuming heavy mail armour.

(This talent only provides bonuses for heavy mail or massive plate armour.)

At level 1, it allows you to wear heavy mail armour, gauntlets, helms, and heavy boots.

At level 2, it allows you to wear shields.

At level 3, it allows you to wear massive plate armour.
talents.name: Armour Training

talents.info_text: Increases the accuracy of unarmed, melee and ranged weapons by 6, 18, 27, 35, 42.
talents.name: Combat Accuracy

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, and increases weapon damage by 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% when using swords, axes or maces.
talents.name: Weapons Mastery

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, and increases weapon damage by 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% when using daggers.
talents.name: Dagger Mastery

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, and increases weapon damage by 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% when using exotic weapons.
talents.name: Exotic Weapons Mastery

description: Generic combat oriented techniques.
name: combat veteran

talents.info_text: Your combat focus allows you to regenerate stamina faster (+0.5, +0.9, +1.4, +1.7, +2.1 stamina/turn).
talents.name: Quick Recovery

talents.info_text: Your combat focus allows you to regenerate life faster (+2.7, +3.8, +4.8, +5.7, +6.5 life/turn).
talents.name: Fast Metabolism

talents.info_text: Rigorous training allows you to be more resistant to some spell effects (+7, +14, +21, +28, +36 spell save).
talents.name: Spell Shield

talents.info_text: You revel in the death of your foes, regaining 3.7, 8.2, 12, 15, 17 stamina with each death you cause.
talents.name: Unending Frenzy

description: Physical conditioning.
name: conditioning

talents.info_text:
You recover faster from poisons, diseases and wounds, reducing the duration of all such effects by 14%, 24%, 32%, 39%, 44%.

Additionally, when your life falls below 50%, you heal for a base 18, 20, 22, 23, 24 health plus 0.8%, 1.1%, 1.4%, 1.6%, 1.8% of your maximum life (currently 25, 31, 36, 39, 42 total) each turn for 8 turns. This effect can only happen once every 15 turns.

The base healing scales with your Constitution.
talents.name: Vitality

talents.info_text:
You've learned to recover quickly from effects that would disable you. Each turn, you have a 15%, 32%, 41%, 47%, 52% chance to recover from a single stun effect.

At talent level 2 you may also recover from blindness, at level 3 confusion, level 4 pins, and level 5 slows and wounds.

Only one effect may be recovered from each turn, and the chance to recover from an effect scales with your Constitution.
talents.name: Unflinching Resolve

talents.info_text:
Enemies are intimidated by how composed you remain under fire. When you take more then 5% of your maximum life in a single hit, all enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 will be intimidated, reducing their Physical Power, Mindpower, and Spellpower by 18, 24, 29, 33, 37 for 4 turns.

If your health drops below 475, 391, 338, 301, 274, you'll be unable to maintain your daunting presence, and the sustain will deactivate.

The power of the intimidation effect improves with your Physical power, and it's chance to affect your enemies improves with your Strength.
talents.name: Daunting Presence

talents.info_text:
You release a surge of adrenaline that increases your Physical Power by 9, 12, 14, 15, 17 for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns. While the effect is active, you may continue to fight beyond the point of exhaustion.

Your stamina based sustains will not be disabled if your stamina reaches zero, and you may continue to use stamina based talents while at zero stamina at the cost of life.

The Physical Power increase will scale with your Constitution.

Using this talent does not take a turn.
talents.name: Adrenaline Surge

description: Specialized dual wielding techniques.
name: dual techniques

talents.info_text:
Attack with your offhand weapon for 102%, 115%, 125%, 134%, 141% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns, and you hit it with your mainhand weapon doing 102%, 115%, 125%, 134%, 141% damage.

The stun chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Dual Strike

talents.info_text: Lashes out with a flurry of blows, hitting your target three times with each weapon for 64%, 73%, 81%, 88%, 93% damage.
talents.name: Flurry

talents.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc, doing 128%, 139%, 148%, 156%, 162% weapon damage and making your targets bleed for 0 each turn for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The bleed damage increases with your main hand weapon damage and Dexterity.
talents.name: Sweep

talents.info_text: Spin around, damaging all targets around you with both weapons for 148%, 159%, 168%, 175%, 182% weapon damage.
talents.name: Whirlwind

description: Specialized dual wielding techniques.
name: dual weapons

talents.info_text: Increases the damage of your off-hand weapon to 62%, 70%, 76%, 79%, 82%.
talents.name: Dual Weapon Training

talents.info_text:
You have learned to block incoming blows with your weapons. When dual wielding, your defense is increased by 20, 27, 32, 37, 41.

The Defense bonus scales with your Dexterity.At talent levels higher than 5, you may parry melee attacks with your offhand weapon (except mindstars).

(You currently have a 0% chance to deflect up to 0 damage (0% of your offhand weapon damage) from approximately 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.3 melee attacks (based on your Cunning) each turn.)
talents.name: Dual Weapon Defense

talents.info_text:
You have learned to hit the right spot, increasing your armor penetration by 9, 12, 16, 19, 21 when dual wielding.

The Armour penetration bonus will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Precision

talents.info_text: When dual wielding, increases attack speed by 9%, 16%, 22%, 28%, 33%, but drains stamina quickly (-6 stamina/turn).
talents.name: Momentum

description: Control the battlefield using various techniques.
name: field control

talents.info_text: Jump away 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 grids from your target.
talents.name: Disengage

talents.info_text:
Sense foes around you in a radius of 25, 33, 39, 45, 49 for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The radius will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Track

talents.info_text:
A mighty kick that pushes your target away 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 grids.

If another creature is in the way, it will also be pushed away.

The Knockback chance increase with your Accuracy or your Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Heave

talents.info_text: Your great dexterity allows you to see incoming projectiles (spells, arrows, …), effectively slowing them down by 23%, 31%, 39%, 47%, 55%.
talents.name: Slow Motion

description: Finishing moves that use combo points and may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.
name: finishing moves

talents.info_text:
A finishing uppercut that deals 138%, 149%, 158%, 166%, 172% damage, and attempts to stun your target for 3, 3, 3, 3, 4 to 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

The stun chance will improve with your Physical Power.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Uppercut

talents.info_text:
A powerful concussive punch that deals 96%, 110%, 122%, 132%, 140% weapon damage to your target. If the punch hits, all targets in a radius of 1 will take 32, 42, 49, 54, 59 to 162, 209, 243, 272, 297 damage, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

The area damage will scale with your Strength, and the radius will increase by 1 per combo point.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Concussive Punch

talents.info_text:
You spin into a flying leap and deliver a powerful kick dealing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% weapon damage to all enemies in a radius of 1 as you land. The range will increase by 1 per combo point and total damage will increase by 10% per combo point.

Using this talent removes your combo points and you must have at least 1 combo point to use it.
talents.name: Butterfly Kick

talents.info_text:
A vicious finishing strike that deals 192%, 221%, 244%, 264%, 280% damage increased by 20% per combo point you have up to a max of 384%, 443%, 489%, 528%, 561%. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Killing a target with Haymaker will instantly restore 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%, 10% to 13%, 15%, 16%, 17%, 18% of your maximum stamina, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Haymaker

description: Grappling techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.
name: grappling

talents.info_text:
Make a melee attack for 100% damage and then attempt to grapple a target up to one size category larger then yourself for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns. A grappled opponent will be unable to move, take 31, 42, 50, 57, 63 damage each turn, and 3%, 9%, 13%, 17%, 21% of the damage you receive from any source will be redirected to them. Any movement from the target or you will break the grapple. Maintaining a grapple drains 6 stamina per turn.

You may only grapple a single target at a time, and using any targeted unarmed talent on a target that you're not grappling will break the grapple.
talents.name: Clinch

talents.info_text:
Enhances your grapples with additional effects. All additional effects will apply to every grapple with no additional save or resist check.

Talent Level 1: Reduces base weapon damage by 7, 9, 11, 13, 15

Talent Level 3: Silences

Talent Level 5: Reduces global action speed by 0%
talents.name: Crushing Hold

talents.info_text:
Rushes forward and attempts to take the target to the ground, making a melee attack for 46%, 60%, 72%, 82%, 90% damage then attempting to grapple them. If you're already grappling the target you'll instead slam them into the ground creating a radius 5 shockwave for 226, 303, 363, 413, 458 physical damage and breaking your grapple.

The grapple effects and duration will be based off your grapple talent, if you have it, and the damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Take Down

talents.info_text: In a mighty show of strength you whirl your grappled victim around and throw them into the air causing 200%, 241%, 273%, 300%, 323% damage to them and any nearby enemies they collide with on landing.
talents.name: Hurricane Throw

description: Physical talents of the various horrors of the world.
name: horror techniques

talents.info_text:
A nasty bite that hits for 128%, 139%, 148%, 156%, 162% weapon damage, reduces the targets healing by 11%, 23%, 31%, 38%, 44%, and causes the target to bleed for 210%, 234%, 253%, 270%, 284% weapon damage over 5 turns.

Only usable while frenzied.
talents.name: Frenzied Bite

talents.info_text:
Leaps toward a target within range.

Only usable while frenzied.
talents.name: Frenzied Leap

talents.info_text:
Bites the target for 70%, 78%, 84%, 90%, 94% weapon damage, potentially causing it to bleed for 108%, 119%, 128%, 136%, 142% weapon damage over five turns.

If the target is affected by the bleed it will send the devourer into a frenzy for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns (which in turn will frenzy other nearby devourers).

The frenzy will increase global speed by 21%, 26%, 29%, 31%, 33%, physical crit chance by 21%, 26%, 29%, 31%, 33%, and prevent death until -21%, -26%, -29%, -31%, -33% life.
talents.message: @Source@ tries to bite @Target@ with razor sharp teeth!
talents.name: Gnashing Teeth

description: The blending together of magic and melee prowess.
name: magical combat

talents.info_text:
Allows you to use melee weapons to focus your spells, granting a 36%, 47%, 55%, 61%, 65% chance per melee attack to cast an offensive spell as a free action on the target.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown, but only works if the spell is not already cooling down.

You may select an allowed spell to trigger this way, or choose to have one randomly selected for each attack.

While wielding a shield, the chance is reduced by one quarter.

While dual wielding, the chance is reduced by half for both weapons.

The chance increases with your Cunning.

Allowed spells: Pulverizing Auger, Lightning, Earthen Missiles, Flame
talents.name: Arcane Combat

talents.info_text: The user gains a bonus to Spellpower equal to 18%, 23%, 27%, 31%, 35% of their Cunning.
talents.name: Arcane Cunning

talents.info_text: Regenerates 0.11, 0.25, 0.37, 0.48, 0.59 mana per turn, and increases physical and spell critical chance by 1%, 4%, 5%, 7%, 9% while active.
talents.name: Arcane Feed

talents.info_text:
Raw magical damage channels through the caster's weapon, increasing raw Physical Power by 0.09, 0.27, 0.40, 0.51, 0.61 of your Magic (current bonus: 9, 26, 39, 50, 60).

Each time you crit with a melee blow, you will unleash a radius 1 ball of either fire, lightning or arcane damage, doing 94, 118, 142, 166, 190.

The bonus scales with your Spellpower and talent level.

If you are using a shield this will only occur 75% of the time.

If you are dual wielding this will only occur 50% of the time.

At level 5 the ball becomes radius 2.
talents.name: Arcane Destruction

description: Controlling your movements on the battlefields is the sure way to victory.
name: mobility

talents.info_text: You hit your target, doing 64%, 73%, 81%, 88%, 93% damage, distracting it while you jump back 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 squares away.
talents.name: Hack'n'Back

talents.info_text: Whilst wearing leather or lighter armour, you gain 7%, 16%, 23%, 29%, 34% Defense and 4%, 10%, 16%, 20%, 25% Armour hardiness.
talents.name: Mobile Defence

talents.info_text:
You are light on your feet, handling your armour better. Each step you take regenerates 0.20, 0.40, 0.60, 0.80, 1.00 stamina, and your fatigue is permanently reduced by 1.2%, 2.4%, 3.7%, 4.9%, 6.1%.

At level 3 you are able to walk so lightly that you never trigger traps that require pressure.
talents.name: Light of Foot

talents.info_text: You literally dance around your foes, increasing your movement speed by 1%, 3%, 5%, 6%, 8% and reducing the cooldown of Hack'n'Back, Rush, Disengage and Evasion by 0, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.
talents.name: Strider

description: Techniques of the various objects of the world.
name: object techniques

talents.info_text: Raise your shield into blocking position for one turn, reducing the damage of all error! attacks by 200. If you block all of an attack's damage, the attacker will be vulnerable to a deadly counterstrike (a normal attack will instead deal 200% damage) for one turn.
talents.name: Block

talents.info_text:
Raise your dagger into blocking position for one turn, reducing the damage of all physical melee attacks against you by 140, 170, 220, 270, 320. If you block all of an attack's damage, the attacker will be vulnerable to a deadly counterstrike (a normal attack will instead deal 200% damage) for one turn and be left disarmed for 3 turns.

The blocking value will increase with your Dexterity and Cunning.
talents.name: Dagger Block

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.
name: other

talents.info_text: Crawl onto the target, doing 300%, 416%, 517%, 589%, 644% damage and covering it in poison.
talents.name: Poisonous Crawl

talents.info_text: Crawl onto the target, covering it in acid.
talents.name: Acidic Crawl

talents.info_text: Releases stinging spores at the target, blinding it for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Blinding Spores

talents.info_text: Releases poisonous spores at the target, doing 300%, 416%, 517%, 589%, 644% damage and poisoning it.
talents.name: Poisonous Spores

talents.info_text:
Hits the target doing 70%, 78%, 84%, 90%, 94% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The chance to stun improves with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Stun

talents.info_text: Hits the target doing 70%, 78%, 84%, 90%, 94% damage and trying to disarm the target for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns. The chance improves with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Disarm

talents.info_text:
Hits the target doing 70%, 78%, 84%, 90%, 94% damage. If the attack hits, the target is constricted for 11, 22, 31, 38, 44 turns.

The constriction power improves with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Constrict

talents.info_text: Hits the target with your weapon doing 170%, 178%, 184%, 190%, 194% damage. If the attack hits, the target is knocked back. The chance improves with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Knockback

talents.info_text: Bites the target, doing 300%, 416%, 517%, 589%, 644% damage and injecting it with poison.
talents.name: Poisonous Bite

talents.info_text: Hits the target doing 70%, 78%, 84%, 90%, 94% damage. If the attack hits, the target is afflicted with a disease, inflicting 34, 36, 38, 39, 41 blight damage per turn for 11, 15, 18, 20, 22 turns and reducing constitution.
talents.name: Rotting Disease

talents.info_text: Hits the target doing 70%, 78%, 84%, 90%, 94% damage. If the attack hits, the target is afflicted with a disease, inflicting 34, 36, 38, 39, 41 blight damage per turn for 11, 15, 18, 20, 22 turns and reducing dexterity.
talents.name: Decrepitude Disease

talents.info_text: Hits the target doing 70%, 78%, 84%, 90%, 94% damage. If the attack hits, the target is afflicted with a disease, inflicting 34, 36, 38, 39, 41 blight damage per turn for 11, 15, 18, 20, 22 turns and reducing strength.
talents.name: Weakness Disease

talents.info_text: Hits the target doing 104%, 113%, 121%, 128%, 133% damage; if the attack hits, the target is pinned to the ground for 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 turns.
talents.name: Grab

talents.info_text: Hits the target with a mighty blow to the legs doing 115%, 122%, 127%, 131%, 135% weapon damage. If the attack hits, the target is unable to move for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.
talents.name: Crush

talents.info_text: Causes the user to explode (killing it) in a blinding light burst for 29, 47, 61, 75, 87 damage.
talents.message: @Source@ explodes! @target@ is enveloped in searing light.
talents.name: Explode

talents.info_text: Explode against one target for 1.00 cold damage.
talents.name: Will o' the Wisp Explode

talents.info_text: Pull all foes toward you.
talents.name: Call of Amakthel

talents.info_text: Invoke a slimy crawler.
talents.name: Gift of Amakthel

talents.info_text:
A punch to the body that deals 138%, 149%, 158%, 166%, 172% damage, drains 1, 3, 4, 6, 8 of the target's stamina per combo point, and dazes the target for 1, 1, 1, 1, 2 to 1, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

The daze chance will increase with your Physical Power.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Body Shot

talents.info_text:
Reduces the cooldown on all your Pugilism talents by 6%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 29%. Additionally, every time you earn a combo point, you will regain 0.18, 0.43, 0.65, 0.84, 1.03 stamina.

Note that stamina gains from combo points occur before any talent stamina costs.
talents.name: Relentless Strikes

talents.info_text:
When gaining a combo point, you have a 13%, 24%, 32%, 39%, 44% chance to gain an extra combo point. Additionally, your combo points will last 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 turns longer before expiring.

The chance of building a second combo point will improve with your Cunning.
talents.name: Combo String

talents.info_text:
Superior cunning and training allows you to outthink and outwit your opponents' physical and mental assaults. Increases Defense by 12, 16, 19, 21, 23 and Mental Save by 12, 16, 19, 21, 23.

The Defense bonus will scale with your Dexterity, and the save bonus with your Cunning.
talents.name: Steady Mind

talents.info_text:
Grapples the target and inflicts 54, 72, 86, 98, 108 physical damage. If the target is already grappled, the target will be maimed as well, reducing damage by 15, 20, 24, 27, 30 and global speed by 30% for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The grapple effects will be based off your grapple talent, if you have it, and the damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Maim

talents.info_text: Each time one of your foes bites the dust, you feel a surge of power, increasing your strength by 2 up to a maximum of 4, 9, 14, 19, 24 for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Bloodrage

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon doing 100%, 108%, 114%, 120%, 124% damage and two shield strikes doing 100%, 108%, 114%, 120%, 124% damage, trying to overpower your target.

If the last attack hits, the target is knocked back. The chance for knockback increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Overpower

talents.info_text:
Quickly reload your ammo by 1 (depends on masteries and object bonuses).

Doing so requires no turn but you are considered disarmed for 2 turns.

Reloading does not break stealth.
talents.name: Reload

talents.info_text: Forces all hostile foes in radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 to attack you.
talents.name: Taunt

talents.info_text: Under the cover of your shell, gain 38%, 47%, 53%, 58%, 63% global resistance for 5, 6, 6, 7, 7 turns
talents.name: Shell Shield

talents.info_text:
Bite the target, dealing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% melee damage

If the attack hits you'll inject blight poison into the target, dealing 28, 37, 44, 50, 56 blight damage and a further 110, 148, 177, 201, 223 blight damage over 4 turns.

The bonus damage improves with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Infectious Bite

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage. If the attack hits, the target's Accuracy is reduced by 2, 4, 7, 9, 12 for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Accuracy reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Gnashing Maw

talents.info_text:
Dive into the sand and rush towards your target at up to range 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, gaining a free attack if you reach it.

At the exit point, up to 9 sand pits will appear that last for 6, 8, 11, 13, 15 turns (based on your Strength).

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
talents.name: Sandrush

talents.info_text:
Dash forward using rockets.

If the spot is reached and occupied, you will perform a free melee attack against the target there.

This attack does 130% weapon damage.

You must dash from at least 2 tiles away.
talents.name: Rocket Dash

talents.info_text:
Dash forward using rockets.

If the spot is reached and occupied, you will perform a free melee attack against the target there and knock them back 4 spaces as well as anyone else they collide with.

This attack does 180% weapon damage.

You must dash from at least 2 tiles away.
talents.name: Rocket Smash

description: Unarmed Boxing techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.
name: pugilism

talents.info_text:
Deliver two quick punches that deal 62%, 66%, 70%, 74%, 76% damage each, and switch your stance to Striking Stance. If you already have Striking Stance active and Double Strike isn't on cooldown, this talent will automatically replace your normal attacks (and trigger the cooldown).

If either jab connects, you earn one combo point. At talent level 4 or greater, if both jabs connect, you'll earn two combo points.
talents.name: Double Strike

talents.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc with a spinning backhand, doing 128%, 139%, 148%, 156%, 162% damage. If you're not adjacent to the target, you'll step forward as you spin, gaining up to 43%, 43%, 50%, 50%, 50% bonus damage, which increases the farther you move.

This attack will remove any grapples you're maintaining, and earn one combo point (or one combo point per attack that connects, if the talent level is 4 or greater).
talents.message: @Source@ lashes out with a spinning backhand.
talents.name: Spinning Backhand

talents.info_text:
Deliver a devastating axe kick dealing 128%, 147%, 163%, 176%, 187% damage. If the blow connects your target is brain damaged, causing all talents to fail for 0, 2, 3, 3, 3 turns and earning 2 combo points.

This effect cannot be saved against, though it can be dodged and checks confusion immunity.
talents.message: @Source@ raises their leg and snaps it downward in a devastating axe kick.
talents.name: Axe Kick

talents.info_text:
Lashes out at the target with three quick punches that each deal 57%, 69%, 78%, 85%, 92% damage.

Earns one combo point. If your talent level is 4 or greater, this instead earns one combo point per blow that connects.
talents.message: @Source@ lashes out with a flurry of fists.
talents.name: Flurry of Fists

description: Specialized weapon and shield techniques.
name: shield defense

talents.info_text:
Enter a protective battle stance, increasing Defense by 11, 16, 20, 23, 26 and Armour by 17, 21, 23, 26, 27 at the cost of -20% physical damage. The Defense and Armor increase is based on your Dexterity.

It also grants 11%, 23%, 31%, 38%, 44% resistance to stunning and knockback.
talents.name: Shield Wall

talents.info_text:
Let all your foes pile up on your shield, then put all your strength in one mighty thrust and repel them all away 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 grids.

In addition, all creatures knocked back will also be dazed for 3, 5, 7, 9, 11 turns.

The distance increases with your talent level, and the Daze duration with your Strength.
talents.name: Repulsion

talents.info_text: Improves your damage and defense with shield-based skills, and increases your Spell (+2, +4, +6, +8, +10) and Physical (+4, +8, +12, +16, +20) Saves.
talents.name: Shield Expertise

talents.info_text:
You brace yourself for the final stand, increasing Defense by 13, 16, 18, 21, 22, maximum and current life by 158, 216, 263, 305, 342, but making you unable to move.

Your stand lets you concentrate on every blow, allowing you to avoid death from normally fatal wounds. You can only die when reaching -158, -216, -263, -305, -342 life; however below 0 life you can not see how much you have left.

The increase in Defense is based on your Dexterity, and the increase in life is based on your Constitution and normal maximum life.
talents.name: Last Stand

description: Specialized weapon and shield techniques.
name: shield offense

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with two shield strikes, doing 128%, 139%, 148%, 156%, 162% and 156%, 170%, 182%, 192%, 200% shield damage. If it hits a second time, it stuns the target for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Accuracy and your Strength.
talents.name: Shield Pummel

talents.info_text:
Improves your ability to perform counterstrikes after blocks in the following ways:

Allows counterstrikes after incomplete blocks.

Increases the duration of the counterstrike debuff on attackers by 1 turn.

Increases the number of counterstrikes you can perform on a target while they're vulnerable by 1.

Increases the crit chance of counterstrikes by 24%, 25%, 27%, 29%, 30%. This increase scales with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Riposte

talents.info_text: Hit your target with your shield 3 times for 38%, 49%, 58%, 66%, 72% damage then quickly return to a blocking position. The bonus block will not check or trigger Block cooldown.
talents.name: Shield Slam

talents.info_text: Hits the target with your shield, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage. If it hits, you follow up with two automatic critical hits with your weapon, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% base damage each.
talents.name: Assault

description: Slings! Pow Pow!
name: Skirmisher - Slings

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 8, 16, 24, 32, 40 and increases weapon damage by 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% when using slings.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2.
talents.name: Sling Supremacy

talents.info_text: Fire off a quick sling bullet for 88%, 107%, 123%, 136%, 147% damage, at double your normal attack speed. Moving lowers the cooldown by 1.
talents.name: Swift Shot

talents.info_text: Take aim and unload up to 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 shots for 44%, 53%, 61%, 68%, 73% weapon damage each against random enemies inside a cone. Each enemy can only be hit once (twice for talent level 3 and higher). Using Swift Shot lowers the cooldown by 1.
talents.name: Hurricane Shot

talents.info_text: While activated, your basic Shot talent now fires 3 times, with each attack dealing 30%, 38%, 44%, 50%, 54% Ranged damage, at a cost of 25 Stamina per attack.
talents.name: Bombardment

description: Advanced combat techniques.
name: superiority

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on the battle, ignoring some of the damage you take.

Improves physical damage reduction by 13%, 19%, 23%, 27%, 31% and provides a 7%, 10%, 12%, 15%, 17% chance to shrug off critical damage for 20 turns.
talents.name: Juggernaut

talents.info_text:
Take an offensive stance. As you walk through your foes, you knock them all back in an frontal arc (up to 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 grids).

This consumes stamina rapidly (-1 stamina/turn).
talents.name: Onslaught

talents.info_text: Call all foes in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 around you into battle, getting them into melee range in an instant.
talents.name: Battle Call

talents.info_text:
Put all of your strength into your weapon blows, creating shockwaves that deal 36%, 42%, 48%, 52%, 56% Physical weapon damage to all nearby targets. Only one shockwave will be created per action, and the primary target does not take extra damage.

Each shattering impact will drain 8 stamina.
talents.name: Shattering Impact

description: Whatever wins the day, wins the day.
name: thuggery

talents.info_text:
You smack your forehead against your enemy's head (or whatever sensitive part you can find), causing 50, 53, 56, 58, 60 Physical damage.

If the attack hits, the target is confused (25%, 35%, 41%, 43%, 45% effect) for 4, 4, 5, 5, 5 turns.

Damage done increases with the quality of your headgear, your Strength, and your physical damage bonuses.

Confusion power and chance increase with your Dexterity and Accuracy.
talents.name: Skullcracker

talents.info_text: Your attunement to violence has given you 11%, 23%, 31%, 38%, 44% resistance to stuns and confusion arising in battle.
talents.name: Riot-born

talents.info_text: You know how to hit the right places, gaining +4%, +9%, +13%, +17%, +20% critical damage modifier and 4, 7, 10, 13, 16 armour penetration.
talents.name: Vicious Strikes

talents.info_text:
You go all out, trying to burn down your foes as fast as possible.

Every hit in battle has +11%, +15%, +17%, +19%, +21% critical chance and +21%, +26%, +29%, +31%, +33% physical resistance penetration, but each strike drains 12, 9.8, 8.5, 7.5, 6.8 stamina.
talents.name: Total Thuggery

description: Your will carries you through the most difficult struggles, allowing you to fight on when others would have collapsed from exhaustion.
name: Tireless Combatant

talents.info_text: Any time you do not have an opponent in a square adjacent to you, you gain 1.2, 2.3, 3.3, 4.2, 5.0 Stamina regeneration. With the third talent point, you also gain an equal amount of life regen when Breathing Room is active.
talents.name: Breathing Room

talents.info_text: Control your movements to conserve your energy. While this talent is activated, you are globally slowed by 17%, 12%, 8.8%, 7.1%, 6.0%, and your fatigue is decreased by 8%, 14%, 18%, 22%, 26% (to a minimum of 0%).
talents.name: Pace Yourself

talents.info_text: When the going gets tough, you get tougher. You gain 0.2, 0.5, 0.8, 1.0, 1.2 Stamina regen per enemy in sight, and beginning with the third talent point, you also gain 0.7, 1.7, 2.6, 3.4, 4.1 life regen per enemy. The bonuses cap at 4 enemies.
talents.name: Dauntless Challenger

talents.info_text:
For each turn you spend stamina, you gain 0.5%, 1.1%, 1.5%, 1.8%, 2.2% resist all and 0.1%, 0.2%, 0.3%, 0.3%, 0.4% all resistances cap for 3 turns. The buff stacks up to 5 times, and each new application refreshes the duration.

Additionally, at the fifth talent point, Breathing Room and Dauntless Challenger are 19% more effective.
talents.name: The Eternal Warrior

description: Specialized two-handed techniques.
name: two-handed assault

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Stunning Blow

talents.info_text:
Take a step toward your foes using the momentum to cleave all creatures in a 3 wide arc in front of you for 114%, 132%, 146%, 158%, 168% weapon damage.

If you failed to move the damage is instead 57%, 66%, 73%, 79%, 84%.
talents.name: Fearless Cleave

talents.info_text:
Spin around, extending your weapon and damaging all targets around you for 168%, 179%, 188%, 196%, 202% weapon damage.

At level 3 all damage done will also make the targets bleed for an additional 24%, 45%, 61%, 74%, 86% damage over 5 turns
talents.name: Death Dance

talents.info_text:
Takes advantage of a wounded foe to perform a killing strike. This attack is an automatic critical hit that does 1.0%, 1.4%, 1.8%, 2.1%, 2.3% extra weapon damage for each % of life the target is below maximum.

(A victim with 30% remaining life (70% damaged) would take 170%, 201%, 227%, 246%, 260% weapon damage.)
talents.name: Execution

description: Specialized two-handed techniques.
name: two-handed maiming

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Stunning Blow

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 3, 8, 12, 16, 20 for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is -19%, 48%, 67%, 76%, 81% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Sunder Armour

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 120%, 128%, 134%, 140%, 144% damage. If the attack hits, the target's Accuracy is reduced by 2, 4, 7, 9, 12 for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Accuracy reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Sunder Arms

talents.info_text:
Enter a blood frenzy, draining stamina quickly (-2 stamina/turn). Each time you kill a foe while in the blood frenzy, you gain a cumulative bonus to Physical Power of 1, 3, 5, 6, 8.

Each turn, this bonus decreases by 2.
talents.name: Blood Frenzy

description: Specialized two-handed techniques.
name: two-handed weapons

talents.info_text: Spin around, extending your weapon and damaging all targets around you for 168%, 179%, 188%, 196%, 202% weapon damage.
talents.name: Death Dance

talents.info_text:
You enter an aggressive battle stance, increasing Accuracy by 19, 24, 29, 33, 36 and Physical Power by 19, 24, 29, 33, 36, at the cost of -10 Defense and -10 Armour.

While berserking, you are nearly unstoppable, granting you 14%, 24%, 32%, 39%, 44% stun and pinning resistance.

The Accuracy bonus increases with your Dexterity, and the Physical Power bonus with your Strength.
talents.name: Berserker

talents.info_text: Shout your warcry in a frontal cone of radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 7. Any targets caught inside will be confused for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Warshout

talents.info_text:
Tries to perform a killing blow, doing 100%, 108%, 114%, 120%, 124% weapon damage and dealing an automatic critical hit. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

At level 4, it drains half your remaining stamina, and uses it to increase the blow damage by 100% of it.

The chance to instantly kill will increase with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Death Blow

description: Advanced unarmed techniques including kicks and throw that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.
name: unarmed discipline

talents.info_text:
Unleash a flurry of disruptive kicks at your target's vulnerable areas. For each combo point you attack for 22%, 26%, 30%, 34%, 36% weapon damage and deactivate one physical sustain.

At talent level 3 Magical sustains will also be effected.

At talent level 5 Mental sustains will also be effected.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.message: @Source@ unleashes a flurry of disrupting kicks.
talents.name: Combination Kick

talents.info_text:
When you avoid a melee blow while unarmed, you have a 13%, 24%, 32%, 39%, 44% chance to throw the target to the ground. If the throw lands, the target will take 26, 35, 42, 48, 53 damage and be dazed for 2 turns, or 40, 53, 64, 73, 80 damage and be stunned for 2 turns if the target is grappled. You may attempt up to 0.0, 0.9, 1.5, 1.9, 2.2 throws per turn.

The chance of throwing increases with your Accuracy, the damage scales with your Physical Power, and the number of attempts with your Strength and Dexterity.
talents.name: Defensive Throw

talents.info_text:
Toughen your body blocking up to 39, 53, 63, 72, 80 damage per combo point (Max 198, 266, 318, 362, 401) across 2 turns.

Current block value: 0

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Open Palm Block

talents.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc with a roundhouse kick, which deals 82, 110, 131, 149, 165 physical damage and knocks your foes back.

This will break any grapples you're maintaining, and the damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Roundhouse Kick

description: Base martial arts attack and stances.
name: unarmed other

talents.info_text:
Increases your Accuracy by 2, 6, 12, 18, 25, the damage multiplier of your striking talents (Pugilism and Finishing Moves) by 5%, 13%, 22%, 29%, 35%, and reduces all damage taken by 1, 7, 15, 23, 30.

The offensive bonuses scale with your Dexterity and the damage reduction with your Strength.
talents.name: Striking Stance

talents.info_text:
Increases your Physical Save by 2, 5, 10, 15, 20 and your Physical Power by 1, 2, 5, 7, 10.

The bonuses will scale with your Strength.
talents.name: Grappling Stance

talents.info_text:
Grants 0, 5, 12, 20, 25 Physical Power when fightning unarmed (or with gloves or gauntlets).

This talent's effects will scale with your level.
talents.name: Empty Hand

description: Teaches various martial arts techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.
name: unarmed training

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, and increases all unarmed damage by 10%, 14%, 17%, 20%, 22% (including grapples and kicks).

Note that brawlers naturally gain 0.5 Physical Power per character level while unarmed (current brawler physical power bonus: 0.5, 5.0, 13, 20, 25) and attack 40% faster while unarmed.
talents.name: Unarmed Mastery

talents.info_text: Your mastery of unarmed combat unifies your body. Increases your Strength by 6, 8, 10, 12, 14 based on Cunning and your Constitution by 11, 15, 18, 21, 24 based on Dexterity.
talents.name: Unified Body

talents.info_text: When you're targeted by a projectile, your global speed is increased by 0%, 44%, 85%, 122%, 158% for 1 turn. Taking any action other then movement will break the effect.
talents.name: Heightened Reflexes

talents.info_text: Your understanding of physiology allows you to apply your reflexes in new ways. Whenever you would receive damage (from any source) greater than 33%, 23%, 19%, 17%, 16% of your maximum life you reduce that damage by 4.9%, 9.4%, 13%, 16%, 18% (based on your Defense).
talents.name: Reflex Defense

description: Master the warcries to improve yourself and weaken others.
name: warcries

talents.info_text:
Release a powerful shout, doing 122, 162, 193, 219, 242 physical damage in a radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 cone in front of you.

At level 5 the shout is so strong it shatters all incomming projectiles caught inside.

The damage increases with your Strength.
talents.name: Shattering Shout

talents.info_text: Take a deep breath to recover 24%, 33%, 40%, 45%, 50% of your stamina.
talents.name: Second Wind

talents.info_text:
Boost your life and stamina by 9.9%, 14%, 17%, 20%, 23% for 6, 8, 10, 12, 13 turns by bellowing your battle shout.

When the effect ends, the additional life and stamina will be lost.
talents.name: Battle Shout

talents.info_text:
Your battle cry shatters the will of your foes within a radius of 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, lowering their Defense by 5, 11, 16, 22, 28 for 7 turns, making them easier to hit.

All evasion and concealment bonuses are also disabled.

The chance to hit increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Battle Cry
